title: Yucca House National Monument: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The climate is dry and dehydration can be a problem, especially in the summer. Please plan ahead and ensure you bring water. Pets are not allowed in Yucca House National Monument, so please plan accordingly. Services -- such as gasoline, food, water, lodging, or kennels -- are not available at Yucca House National Monument. The closest gasoline and grocery facilities are in Cortez, approximately 8 miles from Yucca House. The road to Yucca House (off Hwy. 491) is dirt and gravel, which may be impassible in wet weather.
